thread.title: Lillie

author: Lillie
title: Lillie
text: the FH-Melody is beautiful, big, soft, but when I ordered f613/27 I was really expecting a blond, not brownish like gold with 2 or 3 pieces of long blond hanging down. I was very disappointed in the color. but the shipping was the best ever arrived in 3 days on time when they said it would. packaging was good. melody pretty just not my favorite color. but I'm keeping. also not color shown N color chart
